help.short: The name of the order item

$expand is supported on device details, forward shipping details and reverse shipping details parameters. Each of these can be provided as a comma separated list. Device Details for order item provides details on the devices of the product, Forward and Reverse Shipping details provide forward and reverse shipping details respectively.

json.schema:
<prop type="array" name="emailList" required="True">
<prop readOnly="True" type="array" name="additionalInfo">
<prop readOnly="True" type="array<@ErrorDetail_read>" name="details">
<prop readOnly="True" type="array<@ResourceProviderDetails_read>" name="managementRpDetailsList">
<prop type="array" name="notificationEmailList">
<prop readOnly="True" type="array<@StageDetails_read>" name="orderItemStageHistory">
<prop type="array" name="notificationPreferences">
<prop readOnly="True" type="array" name="deviceDetails">

help.short: The name of the order item
The name of the order item
The geo-location where the resource lives
Represents shipping and return address for order item
Customer address and contact details. It should be address resource
Mobile number of the contact person.
Phone number of the contact person.
Phone extension number of the contact person.
Shipping details for the address
Type of address.
Name of the City.
Name of the company.
Name of the Country.
Postal code.
Name of the State or Province.
Street Address line 1.
Street Address line 2.
Street Address line 3.
Extended Zip Code.
Id of the order to which order item belongs to
Order item type.
Preferences related to the shipment logistics of the order.
Indicates Shipment Logistics type that the customer preferred.
Unique identifier for configuration.
Hierarchy of the product which uniquely identifies the product
Represents configuration name that uniquely identifies configuration
Represents product family name that uniquely identifies product family
Represents product line name that uniquely identifies product line
Represents product name that uniquely identifies product
Resource tags.

<prop type="array" name="emailList" required="True">
<prop readOnly="True" type="array" name="additionalInfo">
<prop readOnly="True" type="array<@ErrorDetail_read>" name="details">
<prop readOnly="True" type="array<@ResourceProviderDetails_read>" name="managementRpDetailsList">

command.name: update

help.short: Defines the If-Match condition. The patch will be performed only if the ETag of the order on the server matches this value.
The name of the order item

command.argGroup:
<arg type="array" var="$orderItemUpdateParameter.properties.forwardAddress.contactDetails.emailList" options="email-list" required="True">
<arg type="array" var="$orderItemUpdateParameter.properties.notificationEmailList" options="notification-email-list" group="OrderItemUpdateParameter">
<arg type="array" var="$orderItemUpdateParameter.properties.preferences.notificationPreferences" options="notification-preferences" singularOptions="notification-preference">

json.schema:
<prop type="array" name="emailList" arg="$orderItemUpdateParameter.properties.forwardAddress.contactDetails.emailList" required="True">
<prop type="array" name="notificationEmailList" arg="$orderItemUpdateParameter.properties.notificationEmailList">
<prop type="array" name="notificationPreferences" arg="$orderItemUpdateParameter.properties.preferences.notificationPreferences">

<prop type="array" name="emailList" required="True">
<prop readOnly="True" type="array" name="additionalInfo">
<prop readOnly="True" type="array<@ErrorDetail_read>" name="details">
<prop readOnly="True" type="array<@ResourceProviderDetails_read>" name="managementRpDetailsList">
<prop type="array" name="notificationEmailList">
<prop readOnly="True" type="array<@StageDetails_read>" name="orderItemStageHistory">
<prop type="array" name="notificationPreferences">
<prop readOnly="True" type="array" name="deviceDetails">
